name: tm93
effect: Teaches wild charge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Wild Charge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.
